about_the_game:
A park ranger, a true crime writer and disgraced reality TV star are connected by a runaway child seeking how to stop the unspeakable horror that haunts the ghostlights.

Search the vast areas for clues in the style of classic adventure games and combine them into sentences within your inventory page to unlock secrets in both the environment and the inventory.

Unfold the secret behind it all and get to know the cast along with the stories behind the sinister forces haunting them.

Features

  • Move around multiple stylized 2-bit 3d environments, where each one has countless stories to tell
  • Engage with a memorable cast of characters, each with detailed backstories
  • Solve mysteries by connecting clues to each other and unfold a web of secrets
  • A trilling dark ambient and goth rock soundtrack
  • A retro look inspired by a very special era of japanese 3d horror games
  • Countless easter eggs and secrets for communities to solve

content_descriptors.notes: Disturbing content, depiction of trauma and loss of loved ones.
